channel.title: signal transduction on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in signal transduction on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaA9.CYP78A9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA09g55530D Gene Symbol: BnaA9.CYP78A9 Gene Name: P450 monooxygenase Genome: reference genome of Darmor Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaA9.

item.title: BnaC03.FBA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC03G0156800ZS Gene Symbol: BnaC03.FBA Gene Name: FBox-associated Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The BnaC03.

item.title: BnHO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnHO1 Gene Name: heme oxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnHO1, a haem oxygenase-1 gene from Brassica napus, is required for salinity and osmotic stress-induced lateral root formation.

item.title: BraRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g017510.3.5C Gene Symbol: BraRGL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Role of BraRGL1 in regulation of Brassica rapa bolting and flowering.

item.title: BrYUC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g041530 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6a Gene Name: YUC6a protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA06g032880 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6b Gene Name: YUC6b protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09g005830 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6c Gene Name: YUC6c protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BSR-D1;ZFP36
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g32230 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0437200 Gene Symbol: BSR-D1 ZFP36 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CmCIB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCIB1 Gene Name: CRYPTOCHROME-INTERACTING bHLH1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The GA-receptor CmGID1B plays an important role in integrating photoperiod information from the CmCIB1-PHR2 complex and plant age from the cmo-miR156-CmSPL3 module to coordinate endogenous GA levels and signal perception.

item.title: CmPHR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmPHR2 Gene Name: PHOTOLYASE/BLUE LIGHT RECEPTOR2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmCIB1 or CmPHR2 regulates the transition time from the juvenile phase to the adult phase in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: CsKPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI1 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Under Ectropis oblique attack, CsKPI1 expression and jasmonic acid (JA) levels were more abundant in both insect-damaged leaf tissues and undamaged neighboring leaves.

item.title: CsSEF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSEF1 Gene Name: putative CCCH-type zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Expression of CsSEF1 gene encoding putative CCCH zinc finger protein is induced by defoliation and prolonged darkness in cucumber fruit.

item.title: FvJAZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g09690 Gene Symbol: FvJAZ12 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain 12 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: FvMPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g00480 Gene Symbol: FvMPK6 Gene Name: mitogen protein kinase 6 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_5g22100 Gene Symbol: FvMYC2 Gene Name: transcription factor MYC2-like Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: GhBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhBRC1 Gene Name: BRANCHED 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBRC1 has the same function as Arabidopsis BRC1 in repressing axillary bud development.

item.title: GmSAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g054200 Gene Symbol: GmSAMT1 Gene Name: salicylic acid methyl transferase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A SAMT gene from soybean (GmSAMT1) plays a role in soybean defence against soybean cyst nematode (Heterodera glycines Ichinohe, SCN).

item.title: GWHTACFB001163
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsWRKY13 Gene Symbol: GWHTACFB001163 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWRKY13 acts as a negative regulator of lignin biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: MdCIPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000320872 Gene Symbol: MdCIPK20 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A protein kinase MdCIPK20 was found to phosphorylate and protect MdRGL2a from degradation, and it was essential for MdRGL2a-promoting anthocyanin accumulation.

item.title: MdIAA121
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000131759 Gene Symbol: MdIAA121 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdSND1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1121400 Gene Symbol: MdSND1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Dual role of MdSND1 in the biosynthesis of lignin and in signal transduction in response to salt and osmotic stress in apple.

item.title: MtDMI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr5g030920 Gene Symbol: MtDMI2 Gene Name: DOES NOT MAKE INFECTION 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The MtDMI2-MtPUB2 Negative Feedback Loop Plays a Role in Nodulation Homeostasis.

item.title: Ntann12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Ntann12 Gene Name: Annexin 12 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: The tobacco Ntann12 gene, encoding an annexin, is induced upon Rhodoccocus fascians infection and during leafy gall development.

item.title: NtMYBJS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMYBJS1 Gene Name: Methyl jasmonate induced MYB-related Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: A novel R2R3 MYB transcription factor NtMYBJS1 is a methyl jasmonate-dependent regulator of phenylpropanoid-conjugate biosynthesis in tobacco.

item.title: PbATL18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr007980.1 Gene Symbol: PbATL18 Gene Name: E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbbZIP4 is targeted for proteasome-mediated degradation by the ubiquitin ligase PbATL18 to influence pear’s resistance to Colletotrichum fructicola by regulating the expression of PbNPR3.

item.title: PbbZIP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GWHPAAYT014255 Gene Symbol: PbbZIP4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus betulifolia Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbbZIP4 is targeted for proteasome-mediated degradation by the ubiquitin ligase PbATL18 to influence pear’s resistance to Colletotrichum fructicola by regulating the expression of PbNPR3.

item.title: Sl-IAA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA3 Gene Name: Aux/IAA3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Sl-IAA3, a tomato Aux/IAA at the crossroads of auxin and ethylene signalling involved in differential growth.

item.title: SlCyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCyp1 Gene Name: low-temperature-induced cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that, in tomato, translocation of a phloem-mobile cyclophilin, SlCyp1, from a wild-type scion into a mutant rootstock results in restoration of vascular development and lateral root initiation.

item.title: SlMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMPK4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlMPK4 is preferentially and highly expressed in tomato stamens and its mRNA levels increase during early flower development, peaking at the mature pollen stage.

item.title: TaCRY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCRY2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Treatment of seedlings with high salt, polyethylene glycol, and abscisic acid (ABA) up-regulated TaCRY2 in roots and germinating embryos.

item.title: TaGSK3-1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1A02G125000 Gene Symbol: TaGSK3-1A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaGSK3 regulates wheat development and stress adaptation through BR-dependent and BR-independent pathways.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_06s0004g03540 Gene Symbol: VqMAPK3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMAPK3/VqMAPK6, VqWRKY33, and VqNSTS3 constitute a regulatory node in enhancing resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VqMAPK6

item.title: VvSUN
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_00033548001 Gene Symbol: VvSUN Gene Name: protein IQ-DOMAIN 12 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvSUN may act in the auxin pathway to regulate fruit shape in grape,VvSUN, which belongs to the SUN/IQ67-DOMAIN (IQD) family, localizes to the plasma membrane and chloroplast and may be involved in controlling fruit shape through auxin.
